name: Pokemon GO SMS Service
description: Service to search for Pokemon around you using Pokevision.

PGO_USERNAME.description: Pokemon GO username or Google account

PGO_PASSWORD.description: Pokemon GO password or Google password

PGO_PROVIDER.description: Login provider. Google ('google') or Pokemon Trainer Club ('ptc')

TWILIO_SENDER_ID.description: Alphanumeric (has to be activated) or Twilio Phone Number

SEARCH_STEPS.description: Number of steps in each direction. Increase with caution. Request time scales exponentially

REQUEST_DELAY.description: Throttle requests to avoid Niantic throttling. Needs to scale with SEARCH_STEPS

POKEMON_FILTER.description: List of Pokemon that you don't want to see. Comma separated

PERMANENT_LOCATIONS.description: Semi-colon separated list of locations to watch

IMPORTANT_POKEMON.description: Comma separted list of Pokemon you want to be notified for
